record.field: You cannot cancel an invoice with a posted move.
The move "%(move)s" colud not be cancelled because came from origin "%(origin)s". To cancel it has to be done througth the origin.
Payment process method can not be mixed on payment groups. Payment process "%(process)s" of line "%(payment)s" is diferent from previous payment process "%(pprocess)s"
You can not pay line "%(line)s" because its move "%(move)s" is not posted.
